entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light this morning except east 40 km/h gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains late this morning and early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blizzard developing in the morning. Blowing snow early in the morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Blizzard or flurries. Windy. Low minus 32. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 28.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 28. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023
